# Component Library

This page showcases all the reusable components available in this course template. Copy and customize these components for your own content.

## Callouts

### Note

::: {.callout-note}
## Note Title

This is a note callout. Use it for general information or side notes that complement the main content.

:::

### Tip

::: {.callout-tip}
## Pro Tip

This is a tip callout. Use it to share helpful hints, best practices, or shortcuts.

:::

### Warning

::: {.callout-warning}
## Warning

This is a warning callout. Use it to alert students about common mistakes or potential issues.

:::

### Important

::: {.callout-important}
## Important

This is an important callout. Use it to highlight critical information that students must not miss.

:::

### Caution

::: {.callout-caution}
## Caution

This is a caution callout. Use it for information that requires extra attention or care.

:::

### Collapsible Callouts

::: {.callout-tip collapse="true"}
## Click to Expand

This callout is collapsible. Perfect for hints, solutions, or optional content!

## Code Blocks

### Basic Code

```python
# Standard code block
def hello_world():
    print("Hello, World!")
```

### Code with Filename

```python
#| filename: "example.py"

# Code with filename displayed
def greet(name):
    return f"Hello, {name}!"
```

### Collapsible Code

```python
#| code-fold: true
#| code-summary: "Click to show code"

# This code is initially hidden
# Students can click to reveal it
import pandas as pd
data = pd.read_csv("data.csv")
```
